entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron Weasley is introduced as the one who hit Harry with a sharp blow to the top of his head. He is described as grinning down at Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one who was hit by Ron. He is described as rubbing the top of his head and slumping back on to his pillows.

relationships.description: Ron hits Harry with a sharp blow to the top of his head. This is described as 'a loud and excited voice' and 'a sharp blow'.
